arlut.csd.JTable
Class tableCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              arlut.csd.JTable.tableCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
 class tableCanvas
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

This class is the actual pane that is rendered on to create the table. The tableCanvas is double buffered, and optimized for speed.

renderBlitCell

private void renderBlitCell(java.awt.Rectangle cellRect,
                            java.awt.Graphics g,
                            int col,
                            int row,
                            tableCol element)
This method handles rendering into the blit template for column , row , portion . That is, if a particular row is more than one standard row_height tall, spanSubset indicates what portion of the row should be rendered into the blitCell.

mapClickToRow

int mapClickToRow(int vy)
This method takes a y coordinate in virtual table space (i.e., after vertical scrollbar transform) and returns the index for the row containing that point.
